thread.title: Rufus Hound claims he QUIT Celebrity Juice after a blazing row with CBB star Kim Woodburn that never aired
thread.title_full: Rufus Hound claims he QUIT Celebrity Juice after a blazing row with CBB star Kim Woodburn that never aired

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Rufus Hound claims he QUIT Celebrity Juice after a blazing row with CBB star Kim Woodburn that never aired
text:
Showbiz Rufus Hound claims he QUIT Celebrity Juice after a blazing row with CBB star Kim Woodburn that never aired The comedian got on the wrong side of the CBB star during his time on the ITV2 panel show Share Kim's got in arguments before (Photo: Rex) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
After Phillip Schofield claimed Kim Woodburn had been at the centre of a row on Celebrity Juice, This Morning viewers were left clambering for answers. 
It seems as though they've finally got what they wanted, after a 2013 interview with former star Rufus Hound was uncovered. 
In the podcast, the comedian explains that he had a "personal" row that quickly got out of hand while he was filming the show. 
However the row in question, with CBB star Kim, never made it to air. Kim quit the show after the row (Photo: Rex Features) 
He said at the time: "She was chatting away to Keith Lemon and he asked her: 'Have you got much coming up?' 
"She said, 'I don't think the people who make TV would want me anymore'. And I said, genuinely, honestly, 'Don't do yourself down. People will always need a cleaner'. 
"She looked at me and said something on the lines of, 'When I want an opinion of a fat man, I'll stand outside Gregg's'. (Photo: Rex Features) 
He went on to reveal that the argument quickly became bigger than it needed to be as Kim became more and more heated. 
"It ended up really horrible. She was trying to be deliberately personal, and by the point it got to that place, I was like, 'OK, because I'm a stand-up comedian and if you want to start heckling, I'm good at this'. 
"And so I was personal back. She basically kept saying I was fat. But I did end up saying, 'That's a bit rich coming from a woman who looks like a face drawn on a deflating party balloon.'" Kim snapped on This Morning yesterday (Photo: Rex Features) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
